revision.text: Possibly: A Complete Dictionary of the English Language, Both with regard to Sound and Meaning: One main Object of which is, to establish a plain and permanent Standard of Pronunciation. To which is prefixed a Prosodial Grammar. By Thomas Sheridan, A.M. 2v. (London : Printed for Charles Dilly, in the Poultry, MDCCXCVII. [1797]). http://library.st-andrews.ac.uk/record=b2402164~S1
